concept.title: Edit a meeting
concept.shortdesc: You can edit a meeting for My Meetings, Recent, and Saved.

ul.li: Edit and Copy apply to both My Meetings and Saved. Swipe left to edit or copy a meeting.
Delete applies to My Meetings, Recent, and Saved. Swipe right to delete a meeting.

conbody.p: You can Edit a meeting either when no one is present in the meeting room or when the meeting starts.

p.b: Edit Meeting - No one is in meeting room

ol.li: Tap Edit for a modal view to edit options. The Meeting name is in read-only mode. You cannot edit it.
Tap Meeting Password to add a password. The minimum length of the password must be 8 characters.
Tap Moderated Meeting to control the aspects of the meeting. This option allows only you or a designated moderator to start and control the other aspects of the meeting.
Tap Allow guest access for users to enter the meeting in view-only mode.
You can either start the meeting through Start Meeting or save it for later by tapping Save and copy.
Tap Edit. When the meeting is in progress Start meeting changes to Meeting in progress.
Tap Meeting Password to add a password. The minimum length of the password must be 8 characters.
Tap Moderated Meeting to control the aspects of the meeting. This option allows only you or a designated moderator to start and control the other aspects of the meeting.
Tap Allow guest access for users to enter the meeting in view-only mode.
Tap Save and copy. A prompt/message displays. The prompt message depends on the change made to the meeting.
